documentation.title: SlideMenuParent Class [Javascript]
documentation.metadescription: KoolSlideMenu is very Easy-to-Use PHP Slide Menu. Based on Semantic rendering, Advanced CSS together with natural Sliding effect, KoolSlideMenu is Super Fast in rendering, Highly Appearance-Customizable and Elegant Behaviors, all making it stand out to be Excellent Choice for your Site Navigation
documentation.metakeywords: php menu, php slidemenu,php slide menu, ajax menu, php ajax menu,sliding menu, vertical menu

method.name: expand
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testSlideMenu()
    {
        // Expand the parent with id="parent"
        ksm.getItem("parent").expand();
    }
</script>

method.name: collapse
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testSlideMenu()
    {
        // Collapse the parent with id="parent"
        ksm.getItem("parent").collapse();
    }
</script>

method.name: isExpanded
method.shortdesc: Get whether the parent is expanded
method.longdesc: Get whether the parent is expanded
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testSlideMenu()
    {
        //Collapse the parent if it is expanded
		if (ksm.getItem("parent").isExpanded())
        {
            ksm.getItem("parent").collapse();
        }
    }
</script>

method.name: getSlideMenu
method.shortdesc: Get object of slidemenu which the parent belongs to Show example
method.longdesc: Get object of slidemenu which the parent belongs to Show example
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testSlideMenu()
    {
        // Get slidemenu object of a parent with id="parent", then collapse all the slidemenu
        var _parent = new SlideMenuParent("parent");
        _parent.getSlideMenu().collapseAll();
    }
</script>
